response.job_title: Corporate Development Director | M&A | Corporate Finance | Financial Planning (FP&A) | Financial Management
response.summary:
For more than 7 years I have led the activities of the administrative and financial areas of companies from several economic sectors, for which I have managed and controlled their human, economic and financial resources, guaranteeing with my management the best liquidity, profitability and productivity conditions. for the business.

Thanks to my background and training as an Industrial Engineer, bilingual, Master in Financial Management, FMVA Certificate (CFI), I have developed extensive knowledge in financial planning (FP&A): investment projects valuation, business valuation (M&A), financial modeling (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, WC, WACC, DCF, Sensitivity Analysis), intangible assets valuation (Purchase Price Allocation), budget planning and control, financial risk management, forecasting, strategic planning, reporting management and investment documents. Experience leading expansion and divestment projects in Colombia, Mexico, Peru, Brazil, the Dominican Republic, Panama, Puerto Rico and the United States.
response.skills: Banca de inversión, Elaboración de informes financieros, Contabilidad, Corporate Development, Business Planning, Corporate Finance, Financial Analysis, Real Estate Economics, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Productivity Improvement, Economic Development, Research, Supply Chain Management, Logistics Engineering, Project Management, Payroll Administration, Budget Management, Corporate Social Responsibility, Budgeting, Oil & Gas

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the financial and strategic valuation of investment projects at a global and local level, within the framework of Greenfield projects as well as the acquisition/merger (M&A) of consolidated companies, monitoring of Due Diligence and Closing processes, intangible assets valuation. 

By supporting the company's growth strategy with brownfield asset aqcuisition projects, we closed M&A transactions worth more than US$200M. 

We also expanded the different businesses of the business group by opening more than 40 business units, generating an increase in revenue of more than US$165M per year.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Development Leader

profile_positions.description:
- Corporate Finance module for the Master in Financial Management and Specialization in Financial Administration
- Working Capital Administration and Leadership and Financial Management Skills modules for the Master of Administration (MBA)
profile_positions.title: Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
During this period I was in charge of the planning, management, control and execution of the budgeted resources. Also to register, inform and give concept on the budgetary availability for the processing of accounts payable, requirements of goods or services and contract management. Responsible for a budget of US$603,000/year.

We managed to reduce returns and reprocessing of accounts by 90% by structuring the guidelines for the process of legalizations and advances. In addition to achieving 99% execution of a budget of US$603,000.
profile_positions.title: Budget Professional

profile_positions.description:
I designed and directed the formulation of management and impact indicators, establishment and monitoring of schedules, contracting of suppliers and acquisitions, identification and mitigation of risks. In addition to managing a US$63,000 budget for the project.

According to the above, we comply 100% in the execution of the activities, dates and publications of the project. We also contributed to its growth thanks to the approval of the project in other areas of influence, in response to its positive results.
profile_positions.title: Student Intern - Management of Social Investment Projects

profile_positions.description:
With the goal of evaluating the economic, logistical and environmental competitiveness of the development of these activities at night, compared to the day, I supported the planning, execution and monitoring of the consulting project "Implementation of a night loading and unloading pilot in companies of two zonal planning units (UPZ) of Bogotá" for the city's Mobility Secretariat, which was developed through the PMI methodology. 

Based on the above, we achieved: 
*Partnerships with important companies such as Bavaria, Nutresa, Doria, Team Foods, Casa Luker and Alkosto.
*Detect potential increases in productivity of up to 284%, in logistical and economic terms. 
*Opportunities for improvement of up to 61%.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student of Consulting in Economics and Productivity - Researcher

company.name: Keralty
company.description:
Formerly Organización Sanitas Internacional, Keralty is a multinational business group offering integrated health solutions across the health sector—providing both health care financing and health care delivery itself. Also includes educational and socially-focused organizations that complement our world of health mission.

Our approach to integrating practice, education and research has made us leaders in patient experience, clinical outcomes and innovation. We strive to deliver the best care to every member and patient, helping them get healthier and providing comprehensive care for the sick.

Focused on the health and well-being of our members, patients and communities, we continue to elevate the state of health care in the countries where we have presence through technological, social and organizational innovation while generating employment, wealth and quality of life.
